annotations.description: A NooBaa bucket {{ $labels.bucket_name }} is in error state for more than 5m
annotations.message: A NooBaa Bucket Is In Error State

annotations.description: A NooBaa namespace bucket {{ $labels.bucket_name }} is in error state for more than 5m
annotations.message: A NooBaa Namespace Bucket Is In Error State

annotations.description: A NooBaa bucket {{ $labels.bucket_name }} is using {{ printf "%0.0f" $value }}% of its quota
annotations.message: A NooBaa Bucket Is In Reaching Quota State

annotations.description: A NooBaa bucket {{ $labels.bucket_name }} is exceeding its quota - {{ printf "%0.0f" $value }}% used
annotations.message: A NooBaa Bucket Is In Exceeding Quota State

annotations.description: A NooBaa bucket {{ $labels.bucket_name }} is using {{ printf "%0.0f" $value }}% of its capacity
annotations.message: A NooBaa Bucket Is In Low Capacity State

annotations.description: A NooBaa bucket {{ $labels.bucket_name }} is using all of its capacity
annotations.message: A NooBaa Bucket Is In No Capacity State

model.expr: sum by (namespace, managedBy, job, service) (rate(NooBaa_providers_ops_read_num[5m]) + rate(NooBaa_providers_ops_write_num[5m]))

annotations.description: A NooBaa resource {{ $labels.resource_name }} is in error state for more than 5m
annotations.message: A NooBaa Resource Is In Error State

annotations.description: A NooBaa namespace resource {{ $labels.namespace_resource_name }} is in error state for more than 5m
annotations.message: A NooBaa Namespace Resource Is In Error State

annotations.description: A NooBaa system is approaching its capacity, usage is more than 85%
annotations.message: A NooBaa System Is Approaching Its Capacity

annotations.description: A NooBaa system is approaching its capacity, usage is more than 95%
annotations.message: A NooBaa System Is Approaching Its Capacity

annotations.description: A NooBaa system approached its capacity, usage is at 100%
annotations.message: A NooBaa System Approached Its Capacity
